Job Title: Lifestyle Manager

Location: Naples, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Are you an experienced hospitality professional with a passion for creating memorable experiences and elevating community lifestyle? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you! We are seeking a highly motivated and enthusiastic Esplanade Lifestyle Manager to join our team at our prestigious resort lifestyle community.

As the Esplanade Lifestyle Manager, you will be responsible for curating and executing a robust program of activities and events that engage and enrich the lives of our members and guests. From fitness and wellness programs to court sports and cultural events, you will play a key role in creating a vibrant and dynamic resort lifestyle atmosphere.

Your main responsibilities will include:

Designing and implementing a comprehensive calendar of events and activities that cater to a wide range of interests and preferences, including but not limited to fitness, wellness, court sports, cultural events, pet events, themed events, social clubs and groups, and social gatheringsBuilding strong relationships with local businesses, organizations, and vendors to bring unique and engaging experiences to the communityCollaborating with other departments, including sales and the builder team, to ensure a seamless delivery of all programs and eventsActively seeking and incorporating feedback from members to continually improve and evolve the program offeringsMaintaining high standards of customer service and satisfaction at all timesStaying up-to-date with industry trends and best practices to ensure that our program offerings remain robust and relevantWorking closely with the sales team to promote community events and activities, and provide concierge-style assistance to residentsPlanning, coordinating, and executing high-quality events and special occasions, from start to finish

The ideal candidate will possess:

A proven track record of successfully planning and executing events and activitiesStrong organizational and project management skills, with the ability to handle multiple tasks and priorities simultaneouslyExcellent interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to build strong relationships with residents, staff, and external partnersA positive, flexible, and adaptable attitude, with the ability to work well under pressure in a fast-paced environmentRelevant experience in event planning, hospitality, or a related fieldA genuine passion for creating memorable experiences and enriching the lives of others

If you are a creative and driven individual who is eager to make a positive impact in a dynamic and rewarding environment, then we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity. As an Esplanade Lifestyle Manager, you will have the chance to shape and elevate our program offerings to new heights and make a real difference in the lives of our members. We offer a competitive salary, comprehensive benefits package, and opportunities for professional growth and advancement. Apply now and join our team of dedicated hospitality professionals as we create a vibrant and dynamic resort lifestyle community for our members and guests!

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
